mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into restaurant (restaurant_id, address, `type`, phoneNumber, lng_lat, imgUrl, shopName, `password`, email, balance) values (#{restaurantId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lngLat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{balance, jdbcType=DOUBLE})
mapper.update: update restaurant set address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phoneNumber = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lng_lat = #{lngLat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, imgUrl = #{imgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shopName = #{shopName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, balance = #{balance, jdbcType=DOUBLE} where restaurant_id = #{restaurantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select restaurant_id, address, `type`, phoneNumber, lng_lat, imgUrl, shopName, `password`, email, balance from restaurant
select restaurant_id, address, `type`, phoneNumber, lng_lat, imgUrl, shopName, `password`, email, balance from restaurant where shopName like CONCAT('%', #{shopName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
